channel.title: Pagination on Dashboards page does not work
channel.description:
Hi !
My pagination on Dashboards page is not working. I have 7 dashboards, page_size=20 but it shows : - 2 dashboards on the first page - 3 dashboards on the second one - 2 dashboards on the third
When i choose page_size=100, it shows all the dashboards on the first page. However page_size stays at 20 by default..
I am using a clone of Github repository. The pagination on Queries page works perfectly.
Thanks for your help !

item.title: Pagination on Dashboards page does not work
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Thanks for confirming @xavier-d . This is the last thing we needed to merge before proceeding with the V10 beta

Read full topic

item.title: Pagination on Dashboards page does not work
item.dc:creator: xavier-d
item.description:
Same problem has been reported here:

The item count DashBoards View displayed per page is not correct Self Hosted Redash Support
Issue Summary The item count DashBoards view displayed per page is not correct. By default, 20/page, but it actually shows only 12 items. If I switch to 5/page, it only shows 2 items. It can be reproduced on the deploy preview. Redash [image] Technical details: Redash Version: 9.0.0-beta (67263e1b) Browser/OS: Chrome 89.0.4389.114 How did you install Redash: Docker

I’m also facing same problem with latest version from master branch

Read full topic
item.source: Pagination on Dashboards page does not work

item.title: Pagination on Dashboards page does not work
item.dc:creator: dingweihua
item.description:
Redash uses the base paginate method to handle all modules’ pagination. I think it shouldn’t be different between dashboard and query. You are using the master branch? Maybe you can do some debug here.

Read full topic
item.source: Pagination on Dashboards page does not work

item.title: Pagination on Dashboards page does not work

Hi !

My pagination on Dashboards page is not working. I have 7 dashboards, page_size=20 but it shows :

  • 2 dashboards on the first page
  • 3 dashboards on the second one
  • 2 dashboards on the third

When i choose page_size=100, it shows all the dashboards on the first page. However page_size stays at 20 by default…

I am using a clone of Github repository.
The pagination on Queries page works perfectly.

Thanks for your help !
